meanings: (집단·사상 등이 갈라져 나뉨) [명사] division, split, segmentation, (기독교 종파의) schism, [동사] divide, be divided, be spli...
(물리학) nuclear fission, splitting of an atomic nucleus, (생물학) nuclear division
